ComicInfo.Title: Destination: Earth; Peeling and Eating a Tangerine (And Disposing of the Seeds); The Ninth Gland; Aboard the Drinking Leviathan; The Devil Made Them Do It!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Stories in the first part of the 100th issue contain:
Lance Blastoff by Frank Miller
Hartbreakers by Anina Bennett and Paul Guinan
Peeling and Eating a Tangerine by Harvey Pekar
The Ninth Gland by Renee French
Aboard the Drinking Leviathan by Jon Lewis
Milk and Cheese by Evan Dorkin
and a pin up of Mimi Rodin by Dave Stevens
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 14:46:21. [CVDB41200]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/dark-horse-presents-1001/4000-41200/
